assessmentPlans.assessmentTeam:
Security Team A
External Auditor: SecureAudit Inc.
assessmentPlans.objectives:
Evaluate system security controls
Validate compliance with security requirements
Identify potential vulnerabilities
assessmentPlans.methodology:

Automated scanning
Manual testing

Organizational security policies
Regulatory requirements
